Subskills.name: Rapid and Intense Glaciation
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of storm cloud.

Subskills.name: Demolishing Discharge
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by storm cloud.

Subskills.name: Orbiting Tempest
Subskills.description: Conjure multiple storm clouds orbitting around you.

Subskills.name: Storm Conjurer
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of storm cloud.

Subskills.name: Shocking Thunder
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict stasis on hit.

Subskills.name: Destructive Cloudburst
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash multiple charged bolts on hit.

Subskills.name: Maelstorm
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of storm cloud.

Subskills.name: Supercell Storm
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of storm cloud.

Subskills.name: Apocalyptic Event
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash apocalyptic thunder on hit dealing additional damage executing targets with life below a threshold.

Subskills.name: Heatcharged Lightning
Subskills.description: Chance to leave the ground on flames on hit dealing damage over time.

Subskills.name: Thunder's Roar
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional storm cloud.

Subskills.name: Homing Tempest
Subskills.description: Storm cloud now slowly moves towards the closest nearby monster.

Subskills.name: Storm Front
Subskills.description: Unleash a large storm cloud with a chance of striking monsters with lightning bolts dealing heavy damage.

Subskills.name: Aftershock
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of storm cloud leaving the ground below charged with electricity dealing damage over time and slowing monsters on hit.
